articles.author: Sergiu Gatlan
articles.title: New MOVEit Transfer critical flaws found after security audit, patch now - BleepingComputer
articles.description: Progress Software warned customers today of newly found critical SQL injection vulnerabilities in its MOVEit Transfer managed file transfer (MFT) solution that can let attackers steal information from customers' databases.
articles.content: Progress Software warned customers today of newly found critical SQL injection vulnerabilities in its MOVEit Transfer managed file transfer (MFT) solution that can let attackers steal information fro… [+3000 chars]

articles.author: Dan Milmo
articles.title: Facebook owner to push ahead with plans to launch Twitter rival - The Guardian
articles.description: Meta targeting Oprah Winfrey and Dalai Lama as potential users of ‘sanely run’ social networking platform
articles.content: Mark Zuckerbergs Meta is pushing ahead with plans to launch a rival to Twitter because public figures reportedly want a similar platform that is sanely run, with the Dalai Lama and Oprah Winfrey on t… [+7930 chars]
